name: ScryptedHomeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, turn off the lights”
”Alexa, set the lights to 50%”
”Alexa, turn the lights red”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to control your Scrypted Home Automation devices. 

Instructions:
Download and Setup Scrypted: https://scrypted.app
Install the Scrypted Cloud Plugin and login.
Install the Alexa Plugin.
Link Scrypted from the Alexa app on your mobile phone.
